attributes.action: provide more coach parking in london
attributes.additional_details: To demand that the mayor of london listen to the plight of the coaching industy that brings millions of pounds to londons economy but whos drivers are forced to park illegally and risk fines because of the lack of spaces in london and their spiralling costs.we as coach drivers are tired of providing london with its tourists but get no help from tfl when we need to park just penalised and hounded out of trying to park legally and safely by lack of spaces, costs and local borough council enforcement officers
